title: Bella Thorne reveals new gf in topless pics as her boyfriend seems to cosign new polyamorous couple
text:
She was previously in a throuple with exes Mod Sun and Tana Mongeau.

Now it seems Bella Thorne has entered into a new polyamorous couple with an unknown women and her beau Benjamin Mascolo.

The 21-year-old actress shared topless photos in bed with her new lady on Sunday.

Throuple alert: Bella Thorne shared topless photos in bed with her new lady on Sunday

Bella laid on top of a mystery woman in a bed covered with white sheets, as they hugged each other.

Both women were topless but their chests were covered by each other's limbs.

The former Shake It Up star wore only black booty shorts in the photo, while her new girlfriend was in black jeans and yellow Converse sneakers.

'She’s very cute...first girl I have dated that’s camera shy,' she captioned the two photos.

Topless together: Bella laid on top of a mystery woman in a bed covered with white sheets, as they hugged each other. Of the girl she said 'She’s very cute...first girl I have dated that’s camera shy'

The boyfriend: Bella has been dating Benjamin Mascolo since April and was last seen with back in September, commented 'You girls are cute'

Thorne's boyfriend Mascolo, of the Italian pop duo Benji and Fede, seemed to comment in support of the women and in support of another polyamorous relationship for the star.

The pop star, who she's been dating since April and was last seen with back in September, commented 'You girls are cute.'

In the past, while she did not label her relationship, she was in relationships with Mod Sun and Tana at the same time.

Previously: In the past, while she did not label her relationship, she was in relationships with Mod Sun and Tana Mongeau at the same time

Together: Mod Sun and Tana together

Bella spoke to Gay Times earlier this year on the relationship and the hate it garnered.

'I don’t think anybody will really understand the bonds that I share with Mod or Tana,' she said. 'Yeah, we joke around about poly, but we aren’t in the sense that we don’t put a word, a box or label too many things. It is what it is.'

Bella continued: 'It’s not a gay or straight box. It’s this middle in-between world that nobody can put in a box, which makes them so mad. People are so mad that they can’t put it in a box, can’t explain it and can’t see how it works that they hate on it.'

While she is still friendly with Tana, who is 'married' to Jake Paul, she had a falling out with Mod Sun.
description: It seems Bella Thorne has entered into a new polyamorous couple with an unknown women and her beau Benjamin  Mascolo. She shared topless photos in bed with her new lady on Sunday.
